extends Object

      • process

        protected boolean process(char c)
                   throws IOException
        Performs a character reading process.
        Parameters:
        c - the passed in character.
        Returns:
        false if the passed in represents an end of the field, record or file. Otherwise returns true.
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O exception occurred while parsing.

      • read

        protected boolean read()
                throws IOException
        Reads until the next end of the field, record or file.
        Parameters:
        c - the passed in character.
        Returns:
        false when end of file reached.
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O exception occurred while parsing.

        Returns:
        true if the input is an end of line character.
